comments: Also, number of squares <= 10^k, with k = 0, 1, 2, ...  - _Paolo P. Lava_, Jun 23 2014
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
prog: (MAGMA) A017934 := func< n | Isqrt(10^n) >; // _Jason Kimberley_, Aug 19 2011(MAGMA) A017934 := func< n | Floor(Sqrt(RealField(n)!10^n)) >; // _Jason Kimberley_, Aug 19 2011(PARI) a(n)=sqrtint(10^n) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Nov 18 2011
